title: Review: Trettitre TreSound1 Wireless Speaker
description: The Trettitre TreSound1 Bluetooth speaker has a premium design featuring steel and wood – no plastic. Its piano gloss finish, ambient LED lighting, and conical shape make it stand out visually. Unfortunately, the 5-driver audio performance doesn’t always live up to expectations for a $699 speaker.
